name: Pair of Pedestals
description: Pair of Pedestals; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); Paris, France; about 1700; Fir, oak and walnut veneered with ebony, dyed fruit wood (probably pear) brass and tortoise shell; gilt bronze mounts; 88.DA.75; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
